skillTree.name: Dark Steed
skillTree.description: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.

skillTree.name: Cold One
skillTree.description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Naggaroth, tempted from their damp, warm caves to bear the Druchii to battle.

skillTree.name: Dark Pegasus
skillTree.description: The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.

skillTree.name: Hekarti's Blessing
skillTree.description: It is easy to favour Hekarti - who pays close attention to Elven desires - over Atharti, but only the foolish allow that to happen.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Fireball Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Cascading Fire Cloak"
Overcast spell: "Flaming Sword of Rhuin Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Flaming Sword of Rhuin Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flaming Sword of Rhuin"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flaming Sword of Rhuin Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flaming Sword of Rhuin Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Burning Head"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Burning Head Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Burning Head Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Piercing Bolts of Burning Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Piercing Bolts of Burning Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Piercing Bolts of Burning"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Piercing Bolts of Burning Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Piercing Bolts of Burning Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Flame Storm"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Flame Storm Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flame Storm Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_scouting}}
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_steal_technology}}
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_wound}}
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_block_army}}
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Cruel
skillTree.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

skillTree.name: Malevolent
skillTree.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

skillTree.name: Malicious
skillTree.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description: Construction cost: -40% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags

skillTree.name: Vicious
skillTree.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
